attributes.action: PROSECUTE ALL PERSONELL INVOLVED WITH THE TRAGIC MURDER OF BABY P
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All the people who had a duty to protect
the child baby P ,should be immedietley
detained.The bodies responsible should be imprisoned and medically treated for mental health concerns.... This government has a moral obligation not to reject this petition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
